name: RingRingBell
description:
Welcome to RingRingBell!

This is an interactable arithmetic based puzzle game featuring endless waves of enemies who want to defeat you.  Enhance your mental capacity and speed by destroying enemies. Lets see how long you can stand against them!

RingRingBell is a completely free project! I would like to upload it to Play market once I open developer account. Until then, download links will be available here. 

If you enjoy playing RRB please consider sharing it with your friends and relatives. For any suggestions or support of any kind contact me via addresses below:

CONTACT & SUGGESTIONS

[instagram] @baxtiyor.senpai

[telegram] @brackeys    (huge fan of Brackeys)

 [mail] baxtiyorbahodirov24@gmail.com

P.S. Fighting 'till your last breath is recommended.

Download below

TROUBLESHOOTING

Currently, there is only Android version of the game. I may look into iOS, Windows and Linux builds some time in the future. For now, I want to focus on new features and bug-fixing.

REFERENCES

Music by Kevin Macleod ~ The Complex

Background image by Eder Muniz ~ Pixel art forest
